name: acrylic colour
para: Acrylic paint is a type of paint that is mixed with a water-soluble resin. They are typically used to create a layer of paint on a surface.

name: ball point pen
para: Ballpoint pens are among the various means of creating body art, as temporary tattoos for recreational, decorative and commercial purposes.

name: Charcoal
para: Charcoal is an ancient medium to create some of history’s most iconic art pieces. It’s a versatile drawing material, and you can use it with different techniques depending on what you want to create.

name: oil colour
para: Oil paint is a type of slow-drying paint that consists of particles of pigment suspended in a drying oil, commonly linseed oil.

name: water colour
para: Acrylic is a transparent plastic material with outstanding strength, stiffness, and optical clarity.

name: poster colour
